Item.fact: January 23, 2012: Inactive defense agencies under fire for lacking results.

Item.fact: (8/5/12) Funding fell through. We need alternatives. Let's talk soon. -RM

Item.question: Who came forth after the initial leak?

Item.fact: (10/13/14) Swarden's unreachable, you need to contain this. -JJ
